ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Guilds?
ygData.msgSnippet: We have an all Monk Guild on the Brell Serilis server called Zan Fi Monks ... From: Thom Green [mailto:thom_mg@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000
ygData.messageBody:
We have an all Monk Guild on the Brell Serilis server called Zan Fi Monks

-----Original Message-----
From: Thom Green [mailto:thom_mg@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 12:59 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Monk Guilds?


From: "Thom Green" <thom_mg@...>

Only monk-only guild I know of was on Fennin Ro, called the Cohilition of
Fists. Maybe they have a sect on your server.

Sister Shelza, Karana.

>From: czubakaj@...
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Guilds?
>Date: Wed, 29 Mar 2000 19:41:18 -0000
>
>hi there people and fellow monks.
>im just wondering if there are any Monk Guilds out there.
>im really interested in joining one. Im a monk on Rodset Nife server
>and if there is one on there that you know about please let me know.
>If there isnt one yet, i would like any monk in that server to unite
>under my banner and join me in my quest to make one.
>thanks for you time.
>
